Help:Node.title: read
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: read [object]
EXAMPLE: read scroll
Reads the text written on an object. {? equal | $(theatre.id) | IC |You may also read out loud scrolls with recite, chant, cite, instruct, sing, and orate |In some games you can recite scrolls or books out loud } -- see help recite.
SEE ALSO: , , , , , ,
